page.title: 18Tourism in Braunton.(1)
page.content: {Tourism}is probably one of Braunton's {most important}industries.Our group as a whole, decided to conduct a survey in the village itself to find out just why people liked to visit our area. The results of our survey were quite revealing.Most come to use the{sandy {beaches}whilst others like the North Devon{scenery.}A few visitors were here for the first time.Although many people visit Braunton itself, it does not have the best accommodation.The majority of people seem to prefer Croyde and Ilfracombe.The hotels may be of a good standard,but most tourists have a preferance for{rented {flats or bungalows,bringing their own {facility e.g.a caravan or a tent,or {having a package-style tour in one of {the numerous local holiday-camps.}When asked which part of the country they came from most were from{Britain}N/P
